title: Army of Darkness vs Hack Slash 02 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


Army of Darkness vs Hack Slash 2

By:     	Tim Seeley, Daniel Leister, Stefano Caselli	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Horror
Series:   	Army Of Darkness, Hack Slash
Publisher:   	Dynamite Entertainment	
Format:         CBZ

Ash and his new partner Cassie Hack are on the trial of missing pages of the NECRONOMICON and their first case leads them to a prison shower, naked deadites, and an evil double!

Can Cassie and Ash stand each other long enough to deal with Bad Mahesh?

A bloody, twisted ride starring two of horrors greatest monster-mashing icons!
